markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ephemeral Tracking](/Feats.aspx?ID=1771) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16); warden spells

</column>

---

You are able to track your quarry through impossible places. You gain the [_ephemeral tracking_](/Spells.aspx?ID=769) warden spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Ephemeral Tracking
